custom_css: .content-box {max-width: 80%; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding-top: 30px;}

settings.image_banner_des: Completely adjustable for personalized ergonomic support. Whether you're gaming, working, or kicking back to relax, say goodbye to neck and waist strain.

custom_css: .content-custom-image.content-box--absolute {animation: none !important; right: auto; left: 10%; top: auto; bottom: 0;}

a.image.image-custom {display: block; padding-top: 125% !important; background: url(https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0702/4053/4777/files/chairs-details-palette-white.png?v=1722567553) no-repeat; background-size: cover;}

settings.heading: Dynamic Comfort in All Postures
settings.text: Every detail of the Athena gaming chair supports you throughout your day. With advanced ergonomic features, Athena offers unparalleled adjustability. Whether you're working, napping, or gaming, Athena moves effortlessly with you, providing ultimate comfort and performance.

settings.heading: Adjustable Backrest
settings.text: Experience full-body support with a generous 168° recline. Ensure optimal comfort for your head, back, and shoulders. Suitable for gaming, working, or relaxing.

settings.heading: Adjustable 4D Armrests
settings.text: Experience smooth, precise adjustments in four directions with a refined mechanism. Raise the armrests to match your desk for perfect wrist and elbow support, or slide them under when you need to lean in and focus.

settings.heading: Durable Aluminum Wheelbase
settings.text: Tuned for optimal weight balance and fortified for enhanced stability. Ensure the chair remains secure, even during intense gaming sessions or when leaning back.

settings.heading: Memory Foam Head Pillow
settings.text: The memory foam material adapts to the shape of your head and neck, providing personalized ergonomic support that helps reduce strain and fatigue.

settings.title: Reinforced Mechanism
settings.des: Heavy-duty multi-function chair mechanism, tilt and height adjustment.

settings.title: Class 4 Hydraulic
settings.des: SGS Certified Class Hydraulics. Built for strength and durability. Provide smooth height adjustment for personalized comfort.

settings.title: Lockable Blade Wheels
settings.des: Particularly beneficial for users who require precise movements and stability to enhance performances.

settings.heading: Play
settings.text: No matter what your game demands—running, jumping, slashing, shooting, or farming—we are here to support your immersive environment

settings.heading: Study
settings.text: Say goodbye to ordinary seats and experience the new heights of learning brought by gaming chairs. It is not only suitable for gaming, but also an essential choice for improving learning efficiency and focus.

settings.heading: Work
settings.text: Work with confidence and comfort. Our gaming chair is your secret weapon against the pain caused by your desk, transforming your workspace into a personalized comfort zone

settings.image_banner_title: The Work and Play Setup of the Future
settings.image_banner_des: Athena Chair embodies our vision of redefining work and play setups through immersive entertainment solutions. It seamlessly blends innovation and comfort to enhance any environment.

settings.spotlight_block_title: Which Chair is Right for You?
